Room.Name: Temple Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secret passageway in the Ulandian Temple.
Room.LongDescription: This passage has not been used in a very long time. The priests who used to worship here left after a series of earthquakes destroyed most of the temple, making it very unsafe. Many of the stones you see look like they could fall at any moment. There is a bad odor along here.
